questions.question_text: Which type of firewall consists of three interfaces and allows further subdivision of the systems based on specific security objectives of the organization?

discussion.content:
Its D.

A multi-homed firewall refers to two or more networks. In this case, more than three interfaces are present, allowing for further subdivision of the systems based on the specific security objectives of the organization. Each interface connects with separate network segments logically and physically. A multi-homed firewall allows different security policy to be assigned to each interface

Choose the screened subnet topology if the organization offers public services. This type of topology is ideal for an organization hosting a website or an email server. A screened subnet topology provides secure services to Internet users. In this type of topology, the servers that provide public services are setup in a separate zone called a demilitarized zone (DMZ), keeping the trusted network secure from the Internet

Selected Answer: A
Answer is A, EC-Council CND Book, P.383

questions.question_text: Which of the following analyzes network traffic to trace specific transactions and can intercept and log traffic passing over a digital network? Each correct answer represents a complete solution. Choose all that apply.
questions.answer_description:
Protocol analyzer (also known as a network analyzer, packet analyzer or sniffer, or for particular types of networks, an Ethernet sniffer or wireless sniffer) is computer software or computer hardware that can intercept and log traffic passing over a digital network. As data streams flow across the network, the sniffer captures each packet and, if needed, decodes and analyzes its content according to the appropriate RFC or other specifications.
Answer option D is incorrect. Performance Monitor is used to get statistical information about the hardware and software components of a server.
Answer option B is incorrect. A spectrum analyzer, or spectral analyzer, is a device that is used to examine the spectral composition of an electrical, acoustic, or optical waveform. It may also measure the power spectrum.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
Correct answers: A. Wireless sniffer and C. Protocol analyzer.

questions.question_text: Which of the following connects the SDN controller and SDN networking devices and relays information from network services to network devices such as switches and routers?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
CND Book P.1448

Selected Answer: D
I'm going with D

Selected Answer: D
Answer is D, CND Book P.248

Selected Answer: D
The CNDv2 study guide only mentions two examples of MAC models: the Bell-LaPadula (BLM) model and the Biba integrity model.
The Access Control Matrix is a DAC model, and the Chinese Wall model was developed to avoid COI issues but is not mentioned in the book.

Selected Answer: D
Chinese waterfall is not even mentioned in the book, (BLM) is a MAC Model as per ECCouncil material, book page 248

questions.question_text: Which of the following is an example of MAC model?

choices.B: Authentication, authorization, and auditing in networks
choices.C: Regulatory frameworks, standards and, procedures for organizations
choices.D: Assets, topologies, and policies of the organization

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
As per the study guide, the answer seems to be D
I think the correct answer is D. Cnd book page 2289.
